name: Tenebris (itch) (OoobenFloobenGAMES)
description:
Controls:

  1. WASD - to move and climb rope.
  2. E - interact with the world around you.
  3. Left mouse button - to throw.

Credits:

  1. Ben Wilkinson - Game design
  2. Daniel Nutkins - Writer
  3. Todd Jurkeviciute - Gartist
  4. Maryam Alizada- Gartist
  5. Samuel Stocks - Programmer
  6. Jacob Heaton -Programmer
